name: Crystals and Curses
description: Welcome to Asterra, where the puzzles are cursed, the lobsters gamble, and riddles lead you somewhere you never expected.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.4 GHz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 600 MB available space
